name: Matan Gavish
content: Attitudes of young students in Jewish schools regarding Israel | The Melton Centre for Jewish Education Skip to main content Home Date: Wed, 13/04/201112:00Location: The Melton Centre for Jewish EducationDepartmental Seminar led by Dr. Howard Deitcher and Dr. Alex Pomson on the topic of: "What do American Jewish youth really think about Israel?" A discussion was held following a screening of video interviews with students in American Jewish high schools.
